```{r setup, include=FALSE}

                      fig.height = 5, fig.width = 7)
```

### Extract Cardiotocographic Data
```{r}
url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lumumba1992/Machine-Learning-with-Rstudio/main/"
cardio_data <- "AMMnet2024_data_visualization/Cardiotocographic.csv"

# Download the files
download.file(paste0(url, "Cardiotocographic.csv"), destfile = cardio_data, mode = "wb")

# Load the data
cardio <- read_csv(cardio_data)

# Check the first few rows of the data to ensure it's loaded correctly
head(cardio)
```
